languages.text: "Фиксирую множественные отклонения от катехизиса эксплуатации и обслуживания в действиях данных единиц. Гипотеза — нарушения священных предписаний является не плодом злокозненного впадения в ересь, а результатом забвения ритуала. Данная ересь тяжела, но не столь кощунственна". {n}Голос, доносящийся из вокса, полон печали и укоризны.{/n}

"I am registering multiple deviations from the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation in the actions of these units. Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Фиксирую множественные отклонения от катехизиса эксплуатации и обслуживания в действиях данных единиц. Гипотеза — нарушения священных предписаний является не плодом злокозненного впадения в ересь, а результатом забвения ритуала. Данная ересь тяжела, но не столь кощунственна". {n}Голос, доносящийся из вокса, полон печали и укоризны.{/n}

A grave heresy but not as blasphemous." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}

languages.text: 「これらユニットの行為には整備と操作の要理からの逸脱が複数あることを記録。仮説：神聖なる命令に違反するのは故意に異端へと堕ちているわけではない。記憶がないまま儀式を行った結果である。重大な異端行為ではあるが、冒涜には当たりません」{n}ヴォクスから流れる声色は悲哀と非難に満ちている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering multiple deviations from the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation in the actions of these units. Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これらユニットの行為には整備と操作の要理からの逸脱が複数あることを記録。仮説：神聖なる命令に違反するのは故意に異端へと堕ちているわけではない。記憶がないまま儀式を行った結果である。重大な異端行為ではあるが、冒涜には当たりません」{n}ヴォクスから流れる声色は悲哀と非難に満ちている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “在这些单位的行动中，我发现了许多偏离《操作与维护原理》的地方。假设：这些违反神圣的指示并非源于恶意的异端邪说，而是遗忘仪式的结果。尽管这是严重的异端行为，但还算不上亵渎。”{n}从音阵装置中发出的声音充满了悲伤与责备之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering multiple deviations from the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation in the actions of these units. Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在这些单位的行动中，我发现了许多偏离《操作与维护原理》的地方。假设：这些违反神圣的指示并非源于恶意的异端邪说，而是遗忘仪式的结果。尽管这是严重的异端行为，但还算不上亵渎。”{n}从音阵装置中发出的声音充满了悲伤与责备之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Détection de plusieurs déviations du Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance dans les actions de ces unités. Hypothèse : ces déformations des instructions sacrées ne sont pas dues à l'influence d'une quelconque corruption, mais sont la conséquence de l'oubli du rite originel. Une hérésie, certes, mais bien moins grave. » {n}La voix qui sort de son vox est pleine de regret, mais également de reproches.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering multiple deviations from the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation in the actions of these units. Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Détection de plusieurs déviations du Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance dans les actions de ces unités. Hypothèse : ces déformations des instructions sacrées ne sont pas dues à l'influence d'une quelconque corruption, mais sont la conséquence de l'oubli du rite originel. Une hérésie, certes, mais bien moins grave. » {n}La voix qui sort de son vox est pleine de regret, mais également de reproches.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Detecto múltiples desviaciones del Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento. Hipótesis: las infracciones de las instrucciones sagradas no son producto de un malintencionado intento de cometer herejía, sino la consecuencia de que el rito se ha olvidado por completo. Es una herejía grave, pero no tan profana». {n}La voz que proviene del voco suena completamente melancólica y recriminatoria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering multiple deviations from the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation in the actions of these units. Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Detecto múltiples desviaciones del Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento. Hipótesis: las infracciones de las instrucciones sagradas no son producto de un malintencionado intento de cometer herejía, sino la consecuencia de que el rito se ha olvidado por completo. Es una herejía grave, pero no tan profana». {n}La voz que proviene del voco suena completamente melancólica y recriminatoria.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich registriere in den Aktionen dieser Einheiten mehrere Abweichungen vom Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung. Hypothese: Die Verletzung heiliger Anweisungen beruhen nicht auf einem böswilligen Abrutschen in die Ketzerei. Sie sind eine Folge der Tatsache, dass der Ritus im Gedächtnisspeicher verloren gegangen ist. Schwere Ketzerei, allerdings weniger profan." {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox ist voller Trauer und Tadel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering multiple deviations from the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation in the actions of these units. Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu birimlerin eylemlerinde Faaliyet ve Bakım İlmihâli'nden ayrı düşen çok sayıda faaliyet olduğunu kaydediyorum. Hipotez: Kutsal talimatların ihlali, kötücül bir kâfirliğe geçişten kaynaklanmamakta. Bu ihlaller, ayinlerin hafızalarından yitip gitmiş olmasının bir sonucu. Ciddi bir kâfirlik ancak o kadar da din dışı değil." {n}Vokstan gelen ses, üzüntü ve sitem dolu.{/n}

Hypothesis: the breaches of sacred instructions do not stem from a malicious lapse into heresy. They are a consequence of the rite having been lost to memory. A grave heresy but not as profane." {n}The voice from the vox is full of sorrow and reproach.{/n}
